home.subtitle: A full-stack developer and IT Project Manager

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: Hello, my name is Rafał Łukawski. I'm a full-stack developer with over 5 years of modern frontend/backend experience and over 20 years in IT. I'm passionate about the entire software development lifecycle—from system architecture, through implementation, to production deployment.
about.paragraph2: Google Cloud Professional Architect (2024) | Professional Scrum Master | Built systems for millions of users at Onet.pl | Led telecommunications projects at TP.SA | Currently developing complex React/Next.js applications and mentoring developers.

exp0.project: EGZOClinic (software) on multiple devices used by EGZOTech:
